thread.title: Anglo American Doubles Profit Amid Commodities Boom

author: Scott Patterson
title: Anglo American Doubles Profit Amid Commodities Boom

organizations.name: anglo american doubles profit amid commodities boom buoyed

text:
Buoyed by booming commodity prices and lower costs, Anglo American PLC doubled its net profit in 2017, slashed debt and said it would pay its highest dividend in a decade.
Anglo Americanâ€™s results mark a decisive turnaround from two years ago, when the British mining company, hammered by plunging commodity prices and hamstrung by a debt load of nearly $13 billion, began a corporate downsizing. Now the company is raking in cash and promising to maintain firm discipline on spending, a consistent theme among mining companies...
